name: 2ButtonHero
description:
An alien robo swarm attacks your planet.

Wipe them out of here!

PS First game made by Unity, and for the first Jam also. I wish you enjoy it!

Control using 2 buttons (A\B). On the keyboard "A" and "D", or the Mouse left and right buttons.

1) On the ground:

- Hold A - Move slower. Tapping B the same time, fires.

- Hold B - Move faster. Tapping A the same time, fires.

- Tap A - Jump.

- Tab B - Fire.

2) While in the air:

- Tap A - double jump.

- Tab B - Fire.

PPS Boss has the second phase with the surprise.
